TestReportSteps.testObjective: Verify that the added crash record is listed in the audit trail page
TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that in the audit trail report the added crash with crash ID is listed
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to see the added crash with crash ID
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to see the added crash with crash ID
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to see the added crash with crash ID

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that in the audit trail report the added vehicle with vehicle ID is listed
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to see the added vehicle with vehicle ID
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to see the added vehicle with vehicle ID
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to see the added vehicle with vehicle ID

TestReportSteps.stepDescription: Verify that in the audit trail report the added casualty with casualty ID is listed.Capture screenshot
TestReportSteps.expectedResult: User is able to see the added casualty with casualty ID
TestReportSteps.actualResultPass: User was able to see the added casualty with casualty ID
TestReportSteps.actualResultFail: User was not able to see the added casualty with casualty ID
